channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Highway Code obvious rule half of drivers break can cost up to £1,000 in fines
item.description: Motoring specialists have shared a warning for drivers over a simple rule that nobody should ever be breaking - but motorists do all the time

item.title: 'I'm a weight loss doctor - swapping this food can help you lose 5lbs without noticing
item.description: Extreme diets and intense workout plans aren't always necessary for effective weight loss - small, mindful changes can make a big difference, accordin...

item.title: Here’s why this fish looks like the latest being to try lip filler injections
item.description: 'He didn't need a clinic like those American celebrities.'

item.title: Car abandoned at scene of crash with unusual driver still in the front seat
item.description: At least the driver is still smiling.

item.title: Suckable chicken noodle soup-flavoured cough drops are a thing now
item.description: This soup sucks. Literally, we guess.

item.title: Rare ‘one-in-a-billion’ spherical egg to be auctioned off
item.description: The ultra-rare egg was found on a farm in Devon.

item.title: UK snow forecast as weather maps show '2cm per hour' blizzard will blast Brits this weekend
item.description: According to WXCharts maps, snow will start to fall from 3am on the morning of Sunday, February 16, stretching from Stornoway in the Scottish Highland...

item.title: Jamie Oliver's smash hit one-pan baked chicken recipe is 'absolutely delicious'

item.title: Google Earth sleuth thinks they’ve found a face in Antarctica
NHS doctor says this daily 9p pill could help you fall asleep 'faster'
item.description: The expert tried taking the supplement himself and saw improvements in how long it took him to get to sleep at night.
